title: The Best Card Company - Get Well Soon Greeting Card - Inspirational Feel Better Notecard, Animals - Kool Kitties C6891AGWG
features: CARD'S INSIDE GREETING READS - Feel Better Quick! Cover says: Hope You're Feline Fine Soon! - Here's a simple and pleasant way of showing your concern for a sick friend. An adorable and cute greeting card that features a cool yellow stripped kitten wearing a blue sunglasses. A gesture your friend will surely love.

SIZE - This 4.63 x 6.75 inch "thinking of you" note card is a great way to make a sick friend or family instantly feel better. Simply pen a sweet and sincere get well soon message to make this the perfect friendly card. You can even pair this with a bouquet of roses or a fresh fruit basket to make it extra special.

GET WELL CARD - Getting sick is an awful feeling. What makes it worst is when no one is around to look after you and keep you company. Here's a great way to show the people you love that they are still loved and remembered, even if you can't physically be there. This animal inspired card should help them get through their sickness.
The greeting card's cover page is slightly longer than the back for easy opening (yes, it's intentional); Print on demand technology helps reduce wasted paper and material
Each notecard is made from thick, durable cardstock (no papyrus, naturally) with 30-percent recycled content, minimizing environmental impact; The stationery is made in the USA and Canada
description: CAT GET WELL SOON CARD WITH ENVELOPE Show your love ones how much you care for them by sending them this inspirational get well soon card. Simple and adorable, it's the perfect canvass for writing messages of healing. Pen a simple prayer for them inside this wonderful card pack. A simple gesture such as this goes a long way in making people feel so much better. Order this wonderful kitten card today and receive it prefolded with an envelope for your convenience. These high quality, good as gold cards are printed on-demand (and we are very demanding!) in North America - some made in the USA, others in Canada. Many of our fabulous custom & colorful note cards are also available blank to appease one's closeted creative urges.
